Title: Nick Fuentes’ Plan to Conquer America
Description:
For years, influencer Nick Fuentes was too extreme even for MAGA.
Now he's working his way into the mainstream—and has a plan for his secret followers to seize the levers of power.

Title: A first look at Kojima’s OD Xbox game
Description:
Hideo Kojima first announced he was teaming up with Xbox for a new game in 2022, before a teaser revealed the OD name and some cast last year.
We’re now getting a better look at exactly what OD is, in a new three-minute teaser trailer that holds true to Kojim…

Title: Tado’s new AI features will adaptively heat your home
Description:
Smart thermostat company Tado is launching new AI-powered features that aim to help users heat their homes more efficiently.

Title: 'I flew 5,500 miles and paid £900 for a Premier League ticket but was turned away'
Description: The BBC examines Brighton's ticket operation to explore the scale and human impact of touted Premier League tickets.

Title: What is autism and is there a link to paracetamol?
Description: Some studies have suggested an association between the two, but experts say there is no causal relationship.

Title: Gemini for Google TV launches, but only a few can enjoy smarter entertainment
Description: Gemini for Google TV launched, and the company detailed everything viewers need to know and what devices it supports for now.

Title: I used Bose's QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds Gen 2 for a month — these buds are in a league of their own
Description: Bose's QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds Gen 2 retain the same design as their predecessor, but tweaks to the sound makes these an even better choice.

Title: Verizon's 6G initiative said to level up wireless communication for the world
Description: From faster speeds, to being able to "sense" the environment, and integrating AI.

Title: Trump suggests unproven tie between Tylenol and autism. And, Jimmy Kimmel returns
Description:
President Trump linked the active ingredient in Tylenol to autism, but science doesn't back his claim.
And, Jimmy Kimmel Live! returns to the air tonight.

Title: Here are the jobs most and least likely to be transformed by GenAI, according to a new index from Indeed
Description: Indeed's GenAI Skill Transformation Index measures which jobs are most exposed to AI transformation and which roles remain immune.

Title: I broke into tech without a tech degree. I used to see my autism as a weakness, but it helped me gain the skills I needed.
Description: Dennis Tran says being autistic gave him an edge at breaking into a Quality Assurance tech job without a degree.

Description:

Title: The AI boom is unsustainable unless tech spending goes ‘parabolic,’ Deutsche Bank warns: ‘This is highly unlikely’
Description:
“In the absence of tech-related spending, the U.S.
would be close to, or in, recession this year,” George Saravelos says.

Title: Bank of England’s chief economist ‘more comfortable’ with inflation outlook
Description: Bank of England chief economist Huw Pill is less worried about UK inflation than earlier this year.

Title: College Football Playoff Bubble Watch: Breaking down every conference

Description:

Title: Eschatological thinking: why Peter Thiel is talking about the Antichrist
Description:
Trying to make sense of Thiel's obsession with the Antichrist and Armageddon? This article has the answers.
Parts 1 and 2 lay the foundations, and parts 3 and 4 offer an explanation.
(4,100 words.)

Title: Awash in revisionist histories about Apple's web efforts, a look at the evidence
Description:
I've been hearing confusing reports of Apple's openness to collaboration on challenging APIs so often that either my priors are invalid, or something else is at work.
To find out, I needed data.

Title: Altoids by the Fistful
Description: "In evolution, a maladaptation is a trait that is (or has become) more harmful than helpful, in contrast with an adaptation, which is more helpful than harmful." I went to Wikipedia to look that up, not a large language model.

Title: Vision Air and 20th anniversary iPhone could get the same advanced display tech
Description:
